Package gameElements.GamePieces

Class King

java.lang.Object
gameElements.GamePieces.King
public class King extends Object
The King class consists of all the movements and functionality for King The King can move horizontally or vertically or diagonally one space in any direction The King can call castling where the King moves left or right two spaces from its string position and King moves to the opposite side of King
Since:
2022-03-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Max Zhou (mjz94), Dhruv Patel (dvp67)

  • Method Details

    • move

      public static boolean move(Board board, String turn, int[] originalCoords, int[] destinationCoords)
      This method checks if the King is able to move to the position entered
      Parameters:
      board - the board that houses all the pieces
      turn - the current color turn (i.e. "White" or "Black")
      originalCoords - of the original row and column coordinates to be checked
      destinationCoords - of the destination row and column coordinates to be checked
      Returns:
      if the King can move return true otherwise return false
